name: list-program-electron
description: My vue list app put into an electron desktop app
author: Skordio

scripts.serve:electron: set APP_IS_NIGHTLY=yes && set APP_IS_DEV=yes && pnpm build && wait-on tcp:3000 && electron .
scripts.app:build: pnpm prod:rename && pnpm build:front && pnpm electron:build && pnpm electron:builder
scripts.app:build:nightly: set APP_IS_NIGHTLY=yes && set APP_IS_DEV=no && pnpm nightly:rename && pnpm build:front && pnpm electron:build && pnpm electron:builder
scripts.nightly:rename: json -I -f package.json -e "this.name='list-program-electron'" && json -I -f package.json -e "this.build.productName='List Program Electron Nightly'" && json -I -f package.json -e "this.build.appId='com.official-list-program-electron.app'"
scripts.prod:rename: json -I -f package.json -e "this.name='list-program-electron'" && json -I -f package.json -e "this.build.productName='List Program Electron'" && json -I -f package.json -e "this.build.appId='com.official-list-program-electron.app'"
